The band that would have made it bigger and better than the big "4" if only they had a lead singer/songwriter and just left Jeff to play lead guitar and do what he does best.Damn shame,still,itÂ´s always atleast a minimum of 3-4 songs on every album that just can't be missed so you need the full set of albums just to find the old pearls.Still going strong though and Jeffs solo on the musiclablecompilationalbum was hands down 
didn't know until I saw it on youtube,check it out
oh,tnx for the effort and exellent and greatly ... ok,tnx.
